CreatePage.title: Create a new page
CreatePage.titleTopLevel: Create a new TOP LEVEL page

EditPage.title: Editing a page
EditPage.deletePageWarning: Are you sure you want to delete this page? All its children pages will be moved to this page's parent.

Feedbacks.S_PAGE_MOVED: Page moved to a new parent
Feedbacks.E_MISSING_DB: Database not connected or connection invalid
Feedbacks.E_WRONG_PARENT_PAGE: Parent page is invalid or not found
Feedbacks.E_INVALID_PARENT_PAGE: Parent page is missing or invalid
Feedbacks.E_REV_MISMATCH_ON_SAVE: Revision mismatch detected. Someone may have changed the content. Please try again.

NotFound.title: Page not found
NotFound.message: The page you are looking for does not exist.

PageHistory.noChanges: No changes have been made to this page yet.

ReadPageVersion.oldVersion: This is an older version (%{version}) of this page
ReadPageVersion.oldVersionInfo: This version was last saved on %{date} while the newest version is from %{newDate}. You can view the current version following %{link}, or you can go back to the %{historyLink}
ReadPageVersion.moreInfo: The history only reports changes to the page content and title. Change on the page's authorship or hierarchy are not tracked at this time.

SettingsPage.title: Edit settings
SettingsPage.setLanguage: Set the language of the user interface to:
SettingsPage.siteTitleHelp: This will appear at the very top left corner of the application

WelcomePage.title: Welcome!
WelcomePage.content: This page is just a placeholder: to get started, add your first page by using the "Create page" button.
